title: [Nimbus] When Nimbus synced previously and new freshs ync of mainnet happens, pre-pivot block are spamming logs - longer sync
body:
**Describe the bug**
I had a Mainnet + Nimbus synced on local machine. After a while, I've removed Nethermind mainnet DB leaving Nimbus untouched and started syncing mainnet from scratch with newer pivot. Now i have a lot of logs like this:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/43241881/193565749-b2b68901-ccdf-4912-8e54-1efeb850fee5.png)

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Sync mainnet + Nimbus
2. Remove mainnet DB
3. Bump pivot
4. Start fresh mainnet sync

**Expected behavior**
Sync starts from Pivot without processing pre-pivot blocks

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Windows 11
 - Version: 1.14.3 RC

**Additional context**
Done the same thing using Prysm - it moved quickly to downloading block from pivot to head and moved to Snap Sync in few minutes. In Nimbus actually waiting for at least hour.
[Uploading mainnet.logs.txtâ€¦]()

Attaching logs for reference
[mainnet.logs.3.txt](https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/files/9697069/mainnet.logs.3.txt)
